item.title: Spring Boot metrics with Prometheus and Grafana in OpenShift
item.description: Spring Boot Metrics # In this post I’ll discuss how to monitor spring boot application metrics using Prometheus and Grafana. Prometheus # Prometheus is a monitoring system which collects metrics from configured targets at given intervals. Grafana # Grafana is an open source metric analytics & visualization tool. Micrometer # Micrometer is a metrics instrumentation library for JVM-based applications. Spring Boot Actuator # Spring Boot Actuator helps you monitor and manage your application when it’s pushed to production.
